meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4482.

td.p: Heather Goodlett, a sophomore from Hanceville, Alabama
Meghan Apfelbaum, a senior from Menands, New York
Jennifer Wu, a sophomore from Arkadelphia, Arkansas

tr.td: A WEALTH OF KNOWLEDGE
FRENCH HISTORY
ASHTON KUTCHER
ANIMALS
COUNTRIES BY NEWSPAPERS
(Alex: We're talking about current countries.)
FAMILIAR PHRASES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Meghan: What is the U.S. Constitution?)

The Gettysburg Address

JenniferMeghan
')

')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jennifer
Meghan
Heather
A KNOWLEDGE OF WEALTH
(Alex: Not the reverse.)
FAMOUS, LIKE, QUOTATIONS
TELEVISION
MEN OF SCIENCE
GOD BLESS ARMENIA
4-LETTER X-RATED WORDS
(Alex: Each correct response will contain four letters, as well as one "X".)
